title: 关于服务器自动关闭
author: Siopen1
txt_content:
问题：服务端自动关闭。
服务端核心：KCauldron，mod服
出现情况：我的服务器为mod服务器，如果有一个玩家开了纯净版或者少一个服务器必备mod，加入游戏时，服务端就会崩溃（服务器直接关闭）！
案发现场：
1.首先服务器正常，客户端少一个必备mod
2.加入服务器后，服务端崩溃！
3.冲突记录，都是这样子！已经发生过很多次！
4.详细冲突记录：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 17-1-18 上午9:14
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at lc.common.network.LCNetworkController.playerDisconnected(LCNetworkController.java:106)
        at lc.server.ServerEventHooks.onPlayerDisconnected(ServerEventHooks.java:99)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler_23_ServerEventHooks_onPlayerDisconnected_PlayerLoggedOutEvent.invoke(.dynamic)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.ASMEventHandler.invoke(ASMEventHandler.java:54)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:140)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.firePlayerLoggedOut(FMLCommonHandler.java:577)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.disconnect(ServerConfigurationManager.java:438)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetHandlerPlayServer.func_147231_a(NetHandlerPlayServer.java:945)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkSystem.func_151269_c(NetworkSystem.java:162)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:991)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:431)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:809)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:669)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: 虚空流放者
replies.txt_content: 我也有这种情况，建议换核心

replies.author: Siopen1
replies.txt_content:
虚空流放者 发表于 2017-1-18 10:09
我也有这种情况，建议换核心
那服务器也要换掉了 很闹心！

replies.author: 就爱吃麻花
replies.txt_content:
换核心不会影响到已有的，在不报错的前提下
再说了你现在这个核心真的没多少人用

replies.author: Siopen1
replies.txt_content:
1284641389 发表于 2017-1-18 11:52
装上那个必要MOD呢
装上之后就正常了！
